_header: Now sitteth still and harkneth all
_description: An English version of a French proclamation from a mystery play — 22 lines in short couplets

CULMm118.First Lines:
nu sittet stille and herknit alleȝat hur no mis ting ev
                    bifalle…
CULMm118.Last Lines:
…þet tes lordes pays ich gredenu sittet stille bi mine
                    rede
